data.actual_result: You go back to your old profile picture.
data.expected_result: You should still have that default picture chosen.
data.short_description: Choosing a default profile pic, not saving changes , choosing another custom profile pic, resets changes.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to user settings. - Go to my account. - Ensure you have a custom profile picture set. - Ensure you have more than one photo viewing app, example on Samsung, gallery and Google Photos. - Ensure you haven't any default photo viewing/choosing apps set. - Remove your current set profile picture but don't apply/save changes. - Click that default profile picture to set a custom one. - When asked to choose your photo choosing app, click the back button or anywhere outside of the space they ask you on.
